safety.question: Is investing abroad safe through GlobalNest?
safety.answer: Safety is our priority. We only list properties from verified developers. Our marketplace connects you with vetted legal professionals who perform due diligence on every deal before you sign.

experience.question: I have no experience. Is this for me?
experience.answer: Absolutely. GlobalNest was built for the "Zero Knowledge" investor. Our AI explains every step in simple terms, and human experts handle complex details.

financing.question: Can I get financing for international properties?
financing.answer: Yes. Our Financing Hub connects you with Israeli banks offering cross-border mortgages and local lenders in the destination country.

vetting.question: How do you vet the professionals?
vetting.answer: Every professional undergoes strict verification, including license checks, interviews, and track record reviews with international clients.
